name: Joshua Brenner
text: Decent Pizza Hut. Needs a remodel for sure tho.

name: Michelle Williams
text: I love their pizza! They messed up our order so gave us the "mess up" for free. They didnt have to tell us they messed it up but they did and opted to go the extra mile.

name: Adam Zeh
text: Emily most amazing employee here.

name: Joseph Du Vall
text: This location only does pick up and delivery.  Courteous.  Ready when they said.  No waiting

name: Mr Lovecraft
text: So they take calls via a call center now. Not via the store. The call center rep read my order back to me to confirm yet i did not get what I asked for. …More

name: Ashocki RAM
text: The service here lately has been POOR. I've been placing carry out orders online and when I get there (at least the last 2 times) my orders have not been ready. Which is super annoying when it says 15 minutes and you wait 30 mins to go Into …More

name: kevin hallman
text: Walk in order to go that was prepared quickly and professionally. Staff was friendly, offered alternative order to get what I wanted at a lower price. Pizza was excellent.

name: Patrick Walsh
text: Amazing service and pizza highly recommend this pizza place

name: John Orr
text: Absolutely awesome pizza and friendly service!

name: Omd Dragonite
text: Came in around 9 was in and out within 15 minutes lady at the counter was super friendly

name: amanda rogers
text: Good pizza, tasty desserts, and decent prices. Love it.

name: jenn burkhardt
text: Ordered a pizza online. Went to pick it up and they ran out of the correct dough to make the pizza I ordered...

name: Dave Carrell
text: The staff is my favorite. I don't know any of them personally, but they're always friendly to me and my family; moreso than any of the other pizza places on this strip. I've never had an order messed up either.

name: Gail Crump
text: Got 3 med .pizzas 2 pork 1 pepperoni the pork tasted bad! Really funny didn't eat I pizza.. get these all the time. 3 of us noticed!

name: Lauren
text: Our go to Pizza Hut. This one actually isn't the closest one to our house, but we drive further to pick up here because the consistency on our order seems to be better at this location than the closer one.

name: David Spirz
text: Everyone was happy!

name: Jennifer Burke-Korn
text: Fast and done right... that's hard to come by when it comes to take out.

name: Chris A
text: This is not a true sit down Pizza Hut and should not be advertised as such. They 4 tables with 4 chairs each, sodas only in bottles, paper plates and food comes out in carry-out boxes. That aside, the food was quickly prepared and good quality. If you order from here, just know what to expect going in.

name: LaWonda lawonda4u
text: I ordered a pizza by phone. A hour and 13 minutes later I called to check on the status. I spoke with a cashier that told me the person who took my order forgot to tell me the card didn't go through. I asked why didn't she call back or …More

name: Carlos Hudgins
text: Great food and service

name: Brad McGlaughlin
text: Understaffed. One member of the staff forgot to fire my pizza (during lunch rush) and I had to wait. Great customer service but bad operations. Only person working at 1130 on a Wednesday.

name: Amber Losciuto
text: Service and food is ALWAYS amazing! Ordered wings today and they were huge. Quite possibly the best wings ive had! I live near the st peters parkway location and the staff if always friendly. The line up of competitors on the same road need to take some notes!

name: Lisa Troxler
text: Great workers. Very nice.  Clean inside. Could offer a bit more selection. Delivery on time.

name: Nikki Heinz
text: My order was perfect, and nice customer service! I even had a 50% off coupon so it was super cheap!!

name: jessia90
text: Quality has gone down over the years.

name: Karen Ewens
text: My ordering experience wasn't good. I tend to change my mind or to try ordering using different specials to get the best deal. I wanted to make a change but couldn't find a back button so I used my browsers back button and had to start all over again.

name: Dave/Pat Cowell
text: Have used this Pizza Hut for over 30 years.  Always used to be great.  Lately extra sauce means none so I called them 2 wks ago & got a coupon which I used last night on speciality pizza's.  Extra sauce was now a little, meat lovers had …More

name: Gary Wright
text: Great service. I like it where I call in and they remember what I always order.

name: Sean Stewart
text: Not happy with quality of pizza. I understand pizza can be greasy, but the bottom of my pizza literally tasted like greasy slush as it was sitting in the box with all the grease pooled in the center. After one piece I felt like throwing up. Soft squishy greasy slushy pizza isn't what I really planned on spending my money on.

name: kevin schisler
text: Truthfully, last pie wasn't up to their standards☹

name: kim beem
text: Cleanest Pizza Hut I've ever been to. The manager, Paula, was very sweet.

name: Jon Brown
text: Pizza is always hot. I prefer to pickup rather than have it delivered.

name: Paris Btrnone
text: Very courteous staff! Special of the evening was a large 5 toppings. I ordered this; 2 toppings of hamburger, then 3 toppings of jalapeños, pan crust. I was looking for a layer of jalapeños with a hint of meat. I didn't get my layer of jalapeños. But all in all, it was awesome.

name: Jeff P
text: Customer service is on point. Never a bad experience with this location.

name: dawn dunn
text: Carry out is so much better here than at the Jungerman store. They get our order right and polite!

name: John Granger
text: Dine in not recommended. No fountain drinks. Dinning area not sufficiently separated from kitchen. Very noisy and all the smells and smoke from the ovens fill the room. Felt like I needed to get up and get to work in the kitchen.

name: logan timmerberg
text: Me or my family order from here almost every weekend and they are nice, punctual on delivery, and the food quality is almost always perfect.

name: Chris J
text: Good pizza, great prices.

name: robo 317
text: Good pizza great price, if you pick it up, order online-large pizza with what ever you want 10 bucks

name: Ryan Madden
text: Good pizza, fast service, correct order.

name: sue hayes
text: Manager is great  makes it nice to eat in

name: Jelly Bean
text: Very good

name: Tom Asaro
text: Like their thin crust

name: Ahmad Mian
text: Great pizza

name: Tom Kehoe
text: Brought an entire softball team and families to eat after a game.  They had pizza boxes on the table and would not move them to accommodate 20 customers.  They told us "We really don't do dine in that much anymore" seems like they don't like making sales either.

name: daniel simone
text: They coo

name: Jessica Johnson-Cannon
text: Hit or miss

name: PAIN IsMyMiddle Name
text: Awesome food

name: Jeff
text: Great staff.

name: Michael Berry
text: Staff didn't offer the special and we ended up paying 2x the sale price for the same items

name: Dan Wilson
text: Not ment for dining in.

name: Dan Baumann
text: Chain pizza. Terrible eat in option, built for delivery/pick up.

name: Susan Newton, Ed.S SPE CAS BCTS
